DuoFern Stick Code (6 hex digits, e.g. 6: DuoFern Stick Code (6 hex digits, e.g. 6Fxxxx)
Serial Port Help: Path to the serial port (e.g. /dev/serial/by-id/usb-Rademacher_DuoFern_USB-Stick_WR03XXXX-if00-port0 or COM1). On Linux, /dev/serial/by-id/... is highly recommended for stability.
Stick Code Help: The 6-digit hex code for the stick. Must start with 6F. The last 4 digits can be freely chosen (e.g. 6F1234).
